## get_tobii_pos { #get_tobii_pos }

`get_tobii_pos(win, p, units=None)`

Convert PsychoPy coordinates to Tobii ADCS coordinates.

### Parameters

| Name    | Type                   | Description                                                                                     | Default   |
|---------|------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `win`   | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size.                            | required  |
| `p`     | tuple                  | The PsychoPy coordinates to convert.                                                            | required  |
| `units` | str, optional          | The units for the PsychoPy coordinates. Default is None, which uses the window's default units. | `None`    |

### Returns

| Type   | Description                           |
|--------|---------------------------------------|
| tuple  | The converted Tobii ADCS coordinates. |

### Raises

| Type       | Description                              |
|------------|------------------------------------------|
| ValueError | If the provided units are not supported. |
